name: European Federation of Lighter Manufacturers
goal: The EFLM's aim is to group European lighter manufacturers and European lighter manufacturers’ associations and organizations together with a view to debating and jointly resolving problems with which the industry may be confronted. The EFLM does not aim to make a profit from its activity.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Lighter safety enforcement

Proposal for a Regulation on Enforcement and Compliance in the Single Market for Goods (Goods package)

CLP : system of classification, labelling and packaging of chemical substances and mixtures
